sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="home">
    <NavBar />
    <v-container fluid>
      <v-row>
        <v-col cols="3">
          <v-card>
            <v-list>
              <v-list-item v-for="category in categories" :key="category.name">
                <v-list-item-content>
                  <v-list-item-title>
                    {{ category.name }}
                  </v-list-item-title>
                </v-list-item-content>
                <v-list-item-action>
                  <v-icon v-if="category.showSubCategories" @click="toggleSubCategories(category)">
                    mdi-chevron-down
                  </v-icon>
                  <v-icon v-else @click="toggleSubCategories(category)">
                    mdi-chevron-right
                  </v-icon>
                </v-list-item-action>
                <v-menu v-if="category.showSubCategories" offset-y>
                  <template v-slot:activator="{ on }">
                    <v-list-item-action v-on="on">
                      <v-icon>mdi-chevron-right</v-icon>
                    </v-list-item-action>
                  </template>
                  <v-list>
                    <v-list-item v-for="subCategory in category.subCategories" :key="subCategory.name">
                      <v-list-item-content>
                        <v-list-item-title>
                          {{ subCategory.name }}
                        </v-list-item-title>
                      </v-list-item-content>
                    </v-list-item>
                  </v-list>
                </v-menu>
              </v-list-item>
            </v-list>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
        <v-col cols="9">
          <v-img src="banner.webp" contain max-height="500px"></v-img>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent } from 'vue';

// Components
import NavBar from '../components/NavBar.vue'

export default defineComponent({
  name: 'HomeView',

  components: {
    NavBar,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      categories: [
        {
          name: 'Điện thoại',
          subCategories: [
            { name: 'Theo giá tiền' },
            { name: 'Theo hãng' },
          ],
        },
        {
          name: 'Laptop',
          subCategories: [
            { name: 'Theo giá tiền' },
            { name: 'Theo hãng' },
          ],
        },
        {
          name: 'Tivi',
          subCategories: [
            { name: 'Theo giá tiền' },
            { name: 'Theo hãng' },
          ],
        },
        {
          name: 'Âm thanh',
          subCategories: [
            { name: 'Theo giá tiền' },
            { name: 'Theo hãng' },
          ],
        },
        {
          name: 'Đồng hồ',
          subCategories: [
            { name: 'Theo giá tiền' },
            { name: 'Theo hãng' },
          ],
        },
        {
          name: 'Camera',
          subCategories: [
            { name: 'Theo giá tiền' },
            { name: 'Theo hãng' },
          ],
        },
        {
          name: 'Phụ kiện',
          subCategories: [
            { name: 'Theo giá tiền' },
            { name: 'Theo hãng' },
          ],
        },
      ],
    };
  },
});
</script>
<style>


</style>
